name: Formation Soccer on J.League
overview: The game focuses on Japan's top soccer league, the J-League, and features all ten teams active in the 1993-94 season. The game features a standard exhibition mode, a league mode that recreates the 1993-94 J-League, and an All-Stars mode that features two teams comprised of all the best players. The Exhibition and All-Stars modes can be played with up to four human players. The J-League mode allows for two players to be on the same team and take on the CPU-controlled league cooperatively.
